data.name: BTLO Challenge - Browser Forensics - Cryptominer
data.description: Our SOC alerted that there is some traffic related to crypto mining from a PC that was just joined to the network. The incident response team acted immediately, observed that the traffic is originating from browser applications. After collecting all key browser data using FTK Imager, it is your job to use the ad1 file to investigate the crypto mining activity.
data.author: Alvaro de Castro
